旁.definition: one side; other; different; lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)

旁敲側擊.definition: to make insinuations; to take an indirect approach (in making inquiries) (idiom)

旁系.definition: collateral relative (descended from a common ancestor but through different lines)

旁聽.definition: to sit in on (proceedings); to be present at a meeting as an observer; to audit (a class)

旁腱肌.definition: see 膕旁腱肌|腘旁腱肌[guo2 pang2 jian4 ji1]; hamstring (anatomy)

旁若無人.definition: to act as though there were nobody else present; unselfconscious; fig. without regard for others

旁觀者清.definition: an outsider can see things more clearly or objectively than those involved (idiom)

旁遮普.definition: Punjab state of India; Punjab province of Pakistan

旁遮普邦.definition: Punjab state in northwest India bordering Pakistan

旁邊兒.definition: erhua variant of 旁邊|旁边[pang2 bian1]

旁門左道.definition: dissenting religious sect (idiom); heretical school of opinion; dissident group

旁騖.definition: to be inattentive; to be distracted by sth
